title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Border", 1800–1818
medium: brush and gouache, graphite on blue wove paper
inscribed: Lower right on mat, pen and black ink, LAD, 758 (initials of designer).
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Corner floral design on royal blue ground. C-shaped feather motifs of white, yellow and red. Suspended from yellow vines three pink stylized flowers, small geometric square at right center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Border", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. brush and gouache, graphite on blue wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-20.
